nodes.text: The Krinemonen system was a star system in the Calamari sector that contained the planet Krinemonen and its habitable moon Krinemonen III. It was connected to the Damendine and Hinakuu systems by the Tidal Circuit hyperlane. It was also connected to the Buchich system.
One of the Mon Calamari Shipyards orbited the moon Krinemonen III.
The system was destroyed by the Galaxy Gun in 11 ABY.
